testcase.classname: To test Create Event Categories Function
testcase.name: To Create Event Categories with Valid Details
testcase.system-out: Given the browser is open...................................................passed When User opens the URL "https://staging.netscribes.co/tata_ems_testing/admin/d2b5316eadb139ea4a091aeca9ec5bd3".passed And User enters Email as "admin@gmail.com" and Password as "123456".........passed And Click on Sign In........................................................passed Then Page Tittle should be "Event Management System - Admin"................passed And Click on Event Category Tab.............................................passed Then Page Header should be "Event Categories"...............................passed And Click on Add Event Category Button......................................passed Then Header should be "Create Event Category"...............................passed And Enter enter Event Name "Test1" and Status as "Inactive".................passed And Click on Save...........................................................passed Then Page Header should be "Event Categories"...............................passed When User click on logout Button............................................passed Then Page Tittle should be "Event Management System - Admin Login"..........passed And close the browser.......................................................passed

testcase.name: To test the login functionality with valid username and password
testcase.system-out: Given the browser is open...................................................passed When User opens the URL "https://staging.netscribes.co/tata_ems_testing/admin/d2b5316eadb139ea4a091aeca9ec5bd3".passed And User enters Email as "admin@gmail.com" and Password as "123456".........passed And Click on Sign In........................................................passed Then Page Tittle should be "Event Management System - Admin"................passed When User click on logout Button............................................passed Then Page Tittle should be "Event Management System - Admin Login"..........passed And close the browser.......................................................passed
